-- | Sample backend for gitlib showing the basic structure for any backend.
--   
--   Sample backend for <tt>gitlib</tt>.
@package gitlib-sample
@version 3.1.0

module Git.Sample
data SampleRepository
SampleRepository :: SampleRepository
sampleFactory :: (MonadReader env m, HasSampleRepository env) => RepositoryFactory (ReaderT SampleRepository m) m SampleRepository
instance (Applicative m, MonadThrow m, MonadReader env m, HasSampleRepository env) => MonadGit SampleRepository m
instance HasSampleRepository (e, SampleRepository)
instance HasSampleRepository SampleRepository
instance IsOid Void
instance Eq Void
instance Ord Void
instance Show Void
